config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _snapshotSerializers configuration is used to define the journal serializer in the Prevayler create method. It is used to serialize the journal entries in the Prevayler implementation.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The _snapshotSerializers configuration is triggered whenever the create method is called to create a Prevayler instance.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _snapshotSerializers configuration option is that it determines how the journal entries are serialized and stored, affecting the performance and storage size of the Prevayler system.
